name: Project Dead
description:
Project: Dead is an intense and thrilling multiplayer online game that is designed to put players' survival skills to the test. The game is played from a top-down perspective, with players either taking on the role of the Killer or the Survivor. The goal of the game is simple: Killers must eliminate all the Survivors before they can escape the game, and Survivors must find three keys to escape before they are killed.

Game made by Red Wine Games
